EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Transportation-Email-Intertraffic TY-T00208.email.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great to see you at Intertraffic 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Intertraffic 2018 Thank you for joining us at the Intertraffic event; it was a pleasure to welcome you at our booth. We hope that you found it was worthwhile to engage with us, meet industry colleagues and find out how Nokia can be your trusted partner to make highway journeys safer, on-time and better connected.
Throughout the event there were a lot of discussions about our communications infrastructure to enable advanced and demanding Intelligent Transportation System (ITS) for highways. We kindly thank you for the conversations and for your feedback.
A couple of resources that you might find useful are identified below:
- Video on Nokia highways solution. <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tH3obplSrPI]]> This video showcases how to support IP-based applications and mission-critical services on a single intelligent communications network to help you reduce cost and improve efficiency and safety.
- Highways brochure <[[https://onestore.nokia.com/asset/201369/Nokia_Highways_Brochure.pdf]]>. This brochure shows our communications technology solutions for highway agencies and departments of transportation based on 25+ years of highway industry experience and expertise in mission-critical communications.
- Converged communications for intelligent highways: efficiency today, flexibility for the future whitepaper. <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201801]]> Read about our integrated converged communications approach to streamline operations, while preparing for the future of intelligent transportation.
If you wish to stay updated with the latest Nokia highways solutions, please visit our website and for any questions, do not hesitate to contact us.
Yours sincerely, The Nokia team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
